abstract: Standard Chartered has launched a trainee program for the children of private-banking clients, joining bigger rivals including Citigroup and UBS in reaching out to Asia’s next generation of millionaires, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Standard Chartered has launched a trainee program for the children of private-banking clients, joining bigger rivals including Citigroup and UBS in reaching out to Asia’s next generation of millionaires, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: Standard Chartered has introduced a trainee program for the children of private-banking clients, joining bigger rivals including Citigroup and UBS in reaching out to Asia’s next generation of millionaires, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Standard Chartered Teaches Rich Kids M.&A.
